summary: The conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a relationship manager (speaker_1) from a P2P (peer-to-peer) lending platform. The customer had made an investment on the platform and is now speaking with the relationship manager to discuss the details of the investment.
customer_concerns: - The customer seems to be having issues with the call quality, as they mention being in a "live release" environment.
questions_asked: - The customer asks if this is the first time they are investing in P2P lending or if they have done it elsewhere before.
overall_sentiment: Neutral. The conversation appears to be a routine customer service interaction, with the customer and the representative trying to understand the investment details.
